item.title: Elon Musk and Trump’s Feud Has Escalated to Vague Deportation Threats
item.description: Elon Musk’s social media fight with President Trump over the budget bill this week threatens to have a larger impact.

item.title: 7 Daily Habits That Separate High Achievers From Everyone Else
item.description: Success is ultimately the result of making small, deliberate choices every day that compound over time.

item.title: Why Smart Founders Build Companies That Run Without Them
item.description: If you’re still making every decision yourself, you’re not building a business that can scale.

item.title: 5 Empathetic Leadership Tips for Burnout Recovery for High-Performance Startups
item.description: When you infuse well-being into your culture, you unlock a double impact—fueled innovation and sustainable resilience.

item.title: Buried in Busyness? Your Leadership Effectiveness Might Be Taking a Hit
item.description: Your effectiveness as a leader isn’t about how much you do, but about choosing your actions deliberately and with intention.
